import React, { useState } from "react"; const Contact = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ fullname: "", phone: "", email: "", msg: "", }); const formSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert( `My name is ${data.fullname}. My mobile number is ${data.phone} and email is ${data.email}, Here is what I watn to say ${data.msg}` ); }; return ( <>

Contact US


); }; export default Contact;
